1.content: You slowly wake up and get on your feet. The last thing you remember is a bright light and then nothing. Then you look around at your surroundings and realize the you have been shrunk to an inch in hieght! You're excited since you've always fantasized about being shrunk to such a small size and it's finally come true! However, you can't help but also be a little worried since you could get crushed or even eaten by something since you are now bite size. Shakeing that thought as best as you can you decide it might also be fun to interact with some animals at your new size, but first where did you shrink?
1.title: So It Begins

choices: To go to the small pet room
Nothing. Nipper comes in and she looks hungry.
11.content: You noticed that you were in the middle of the living room in your house. That meant that you could play with one of your pets at your new size instead of an unfamiliar animal. But which pet to choose? You have so many. There's your black cat Nipper who is very fond of eating mice, your dog Bandit who was a chow german shepard mix, and at least a dozen more in the room where you keep your smaller pets. You could go play with one of your small pets or you could try to find Bandit or Nipper. You puzzle over this for quite some time. Eventually, you decided...
11.title: Tiny in Your Own Home

113.content: You decide to go searching for Bandit and/or Nipper somewhere other than the kitchen. They both sometimes hang around in your bed room. However, Nipper had a special spot around the water heater that she often went to in order to take naps and Bandit liked to go outside from time to time. So you had three places you could search were you might be able to find them. The question is where do you go to find your pets?
113.title: Search Somewhere else

choices: Everything goes dark before you can see
1132.content:
You go see if Nipper is at her napping spot around the water heater. So with that you start to make your journey toward the water heater to find your black cat. You can't wait to play with her at your new size, and you're sure that Nipper won't mind. You're so excited at the thought, that you forget to consider that Nipper might be all to happy to play with you at your new size as her food. Of course that is only likely to happen if you find her in her napping spot.

You happily make your way down the hallway that leads to the room with the water heater. Your pace seems to quicken the closer and closer you get, and you're so excited that your almost skipping your way their. Eventually, make it to the entrance of the room where the water heater is, thankfully this room doesn't have a door so getting in will be no trouble. You enter the room and make your way towards the water heater in the corner. Next to the water heater you see the large, large to you anyway, cushion that marks Nipper's special napping spot. Question is do you see Nipper on that cushion?
1132.title: The Water Heater

11321.content:
You see the black furry mass that is Nipper lying on the cushion. You're so excited that you begin yelling and waveing your arms to get her attention. After a moment or two of this you see Nipper raise her head up and turns it to look right at you.

"Nipper! I'm over her. . ." You begin to shout but stop when you notice the way Nipper is stareing at you.

The look in her eyes wasn't the loving one that was usually in them whenever she looked at you. The look she has in her eyes this time seems more sinister and predatory. You gulp when you suddenly see her lick her lips.

"Nipper why are you loo. . ." You begin to say, when Nipper suddenly cuts you off by clamping her jaws around your waist.

With a toss of her head she throws you high into the air. You reach the top of the water heater and then you begin to plummet, screaming, back down to Nipper's wide open mouth. You flail your arms and legs in a futile attempt to alter your course. However, you inevitably land on your cat's tongue with a plop. Nipper quickly closes her mouth, effectivly sealing you inside.

You find yourself laying face down a giant cat's tongue as you become soaked from head to toe in her saliva and get blasted by her warm, smelly breathe. Then all of the sudden Nipper begins to lick you against the roof of her mouth and roll you around on her sandpaper like tongue. You beg her to stop and not do this as you try to endure the pain of being tasted by her sandpaper tongue. As you're being tasted you begin to her a rather loud rumbleling sound coming from her throat. You realize that she's purring. Apparantly Nipper really likes how you taste. 'At least someone's enjoying this,' you think to yourself bitterly. Nipper is indeed enjoying it and continues to savor your delicious flavor for a few more minutes. Soon the tongue settles down and starts pushing you back toward the throat. Nipper tilts her head back and with a loud GULP swallows you whole and alive.

You slowly start to travel down Nipper's esophagus, becomeing covered from head to toe in mucus and even more saliva. You don't try to struggle as you are too stunned by the fact that Nipper just ate you and you can't figure out why. Did you wake her up from a nap causeing her to become angry with you? Did she just not recognize you and thought you looked a lot like dinner? You'll never know since you're now just her food. As the muscles continue to slowly massage you down the esophagus you hear all sorts of unsettleing sounds. You can hear the beating of her heart as you pass by, and throughout your journey you can constantly hear Nipper purring. However, the most unsettling sound you hear is the distant gurggle of the stomach, as though it were calling to you. Soon your journey comes to stop as you hit the stomach sphincter. It quickly opens up to accept you as food, and you soon land with a splash in your new home.

"Nipper, please let me out!" you beg as start to feel a tingly sensation all over your body. However, Nipper either doesn't hear you, or just ignores you as her purring vibrates both you and the digestive jucies in her stomach. Suddenly, the tingly sensation turns to searing pain as the digestive jucies start working even harder to break you down. You cry out in pain, but you 've accepted your fate and allow yourself to be digested. Fortunately for you, you pass out long before you're completely dissolved.

Meanwhile, on the outside Nipper goes back to sleep so she can properly digest you. She continues to purr as she starts to dream about eating that tasty, and foolish, snack (you) that had so rudely disturbed her slumber over and over again. In the back of her mind she wonders where she might find more these tasty new rodents.

Well in the end you were just cat food. You really should have known that Nipper would eat you for dinner.
11321.title: Snack Then Nap

115.content: You look at nipper and she looks at you. She suddenly pounces on you and starts kneading you into the floor with her sweaty paws she then grips your head between her toes and licks her lips. You see this and beg her not to eat you alive and even go so far as to kiss her toes, which she seems to enjoy. She drops you but not onto the floor but into her open salivating maw. When you hit her sexy tongue she pulls you in her mouth to savour. Finally she got bored and sent you to her belly whole and alive. After she finished with you you were unrecognizable as a human being as her belly digested you into mush.
115.title: Nothing. Nipper comes in and she looks hungry.

choices: Run towards the reptile and amphibian aile
Run to the small mammal aile
Run into the cage cage next to you
12.content: Looking around you see you some how ended up in a pet store and the store was clearly closed for the night. Then you get the feeling that you're being watched. Turning around you quickly see a cat that some how got loose and it was eyeing you hungerly. You...
12.title: Not Good

choices: The cat digests you and the story continues.
121.content:
The cat comes over to you and sniffs you, frightening you into action. But, it's too late, as the cat snakes out its tounge and wraps it around your body. You hear the cat purring as it tastes you. You think, "Oh, great! I am delicious to this cat! I'm doomed!"

Even though you do not want to die, you know that "resistance is futile" (Hehe, couldn't "resist" saying that line, get it?).

Indeed, you are doomed as the cat lifts you off the ground still wrapped in its tounge and brings you inside its mouth. It teases you by moving you underneath the tounge for a few minutes while the cat goes back to its cage. After it does that, the mega-cat folds its tounge backwards and wedgeds under you and flips you over it as it wraps around you again to savour your taste before eating you.

After a few minutes of tasting you once more, the cat lifts its tounge and you slide down into its throat where it promptly swallows you whole. You are pushes downwards in its esophagus down to its stomach where you will meet your fate.

SPLASH

You land into the cat's stomach. Is this the end???
121.title: Are too scared to move

choices: She goes on to tell you of her life.
1212.content:
You are surprised as the stomach acids apparently have no effect on you. You wonder what will happen now.....

Suddenly, you grow sleepy as the warmth of the stomach lulls you to sleep to some unknown fate.....

THUD

The jolt awakens you as you find yourself in the cat's cage and the occupant looking down on you with concern...

"Finally! You're awake!"

You blink, surprised at hearing this cat being able to speak. You also notice that the cat is a female.

"I was hoping that you lived in my stomach," says the cat, "I just was playing with you, I wasn't really going to digest you.... Not permanently."

You gulp in fear, at the mercy of this cat.

"Not to worry," the cat continues, "I am just glad that you're alive and awake. How are you feeling?"

You shakily say, "W-w-w-well, I'm terrified beyond belief. I thought I was going to die!!!"

"Yes, well.... OI! Where are my manners?? I haven't introduced myself! My name is Blaze, I am of a rare breed of which are able to speak."
1212.title: You live!

choices: she makes you her pet to be eaten later
12122.content: you look at her and smile before saying cool. When she falls asleep you gently massage her paw.
12122.title: Reader's choice.

choices: Another animal is waiting under the shelf to get you too.
122.content: The cat slowly crouches down lifting it butt into the air, a move you've seen plenty of times, preparing to pounce on you. Once the cat is air born you run and head down the next isle. With the store lights out you can't tell which it is but the lights glowing suggest tanks of some kind. The cats claws echo on the floor as it comes around the corner, just barely missing you with a swat, as you duck under a shelf unit. It dark so feeling around you find legs at the back of the unit.
122.title: Run towards the reptile and amphibian aile

1221.content: Before you realize what’s going on, you’re grabbed from behind and pulled under the shelf. You’re blindly carries around until you come to the small mammals area. There, you’re taken into the biggest rat’s terrarium. There’s wooden ramps, two wheels, multiple huts and bedding around. There’s two water bottles and a large bowl of food. You’re set down and you turn, revealing you were taken by a mouse. But, a mouse in the rat tank? As you try to process this, the mouse squeaks something to the five rats that had gathered around. The pure black rat with unnatural pure white eyes squeaked, then all the others scatter. The rat picks you up in one paw and takes you to the
1221.title: Another animal is waiting under the shelf to ge...

12212.content: The rat scampers over to Phares the huts and goes into the one in the very back corner. It’s stuffed with paper towel, toilet paper, and paper bedding. The rat curls up around you, yawns, and settles down. You, don’t know what to do. You’re invited by the rat’s warmth and body heat to lie down. Do you?
12212.title: Left side (Random bedding, huts)

choices: You fall in to one of the animal tanks
You fall into a  live food tank
You get a grip on the ledge of the tank and pull your self out.
1223.content:
Getting off the floor would be helpful in both trying to avoid the cat or anything else on the floor. The pattern on the legs of the metal shelf unit look like a ladder so up you climb. The cat trying to still get you rocks the shelf every time it jumps up trying to hit you, but instead hitting the shelf.
Getting to the fourth shelf you get knocked of the side on top of a plastic top with holes in it. Getting on your feet you attempt to keep your balance, as you make your way to some boxes piled up, so you can hide better from the cat. The plastic your on is also shifting with the movement of the shelf, and as you reach the end and go to climb on the boxes, it slides out from under you and you fall down the opening.
1223.title: Get off the floor

12231.content:
Which tank does it be long too


Amphibian- frog, toad, newt, salamander

Reptile- snake, lizard, turtle, chameleon, bearded dragon
12231.title: You fall in to one of the animal tanks

12232.content:
Which live food tank do you fall in to?


Meal worm/ grubs

Cricket/locusts
12232.title: You fall into a  live food tank

122322.content: Waking up from your fall, you feel drips of wet liquid on you, you come face to face with cricket. It seems to be double you size, as it stands over you, and the dripping was it spit. Quickly crawling away, you notice the cricket is getting bigger, and realize your the one getting smaller. The crickets saliva must be causing it so you would be small enuf to eat. You stop at around 1/4 of an inch, running for cover under a bowl in the corner, thinking how your going to get free and survive. You've been hiding under the bowl for an hour, before it starts to shift and move, as a cricket pushes it's way underneath to get at you. Your backed into a corner with no escape. The cricket looms over you, and in one quick motion it lunges at you and its mouth opens as the mandibles reach around and push you into its mouth and straight down it throat, to the acids waiting in the stomach. The stomach is cramped with the other food it's eaten that day, not long after you feel a tingling sensation that slowly escalated to a painful burning on your body, good thing you pass out before the acid starts to eat away at your body. P
122322.title: Cricket/locusts

123.content: The cat catches you and throws you in the air to catch you in her open maw. When you fall on her tongue with a plop she closes her mouth and savours you for a couple of minutes before swallowing you whole and alive. When you enter her belly you feel her stomach acids iimmediately begin to break you down. After a while you are nothing but a digested mush in her belly.
123.title: Run to the small mammal aile

124.content:
You sprint for a cage nearby and slip through the bars. The cat chases you inside but you kept going and slip out the other side, the cat bashing into the cage wall and causing the door to shut, trapping the cat. You won't have to deal with that anymore.

You take a look around and see you're in an isle for rodents.. mice, rats, etc. What's your next move?
124.title: Run into the cage cage next to you(Rodent isle)

1243.content:
You turn to continue, when you hear a loud crash. You can’t tell which aisle it came from, but you decide to investigate. You notice an open door in the back and go through. Once in there, the only light comes through the two small window. Looking a head you realize you’re in trouble. The room was about 5000 by 4000ft. You notice a cage that had fallen, it’s top broken off. That can’t be good. Then you read the label.

Alien spider
Unknown species
Female
Possible danger
Size: 3 feet high

You pale at this. At your height, that thing’s enormous! Now, you’re stuck in the same room and can barely see an inch ahead of you. You hear pitter patter, but pass it off as rain. You whip around just in case but you can’t see any thing. You see a glint out of the corner of your eye and head towards it (unbeknownst to an empty shelf.) You nearly whack your head on something, then climb onto it. That’s when you realize, why is it furry?
1243.title: Continue exploring

choices: The spider returns with another small human.
12431.content: Well, you had just climbed onto what you were trying to avoid. Congrats. She didn’t seem to have noticed you, but it was only a matter of time. You were about to get down, when she started to move. You had to hold on to avoid falling off. As you rode, you couldn’t help but hear a buzzing noise. You keep cleaning your ears but it didn’t go away. The spider started to climb the wall and you really had to hang on. She climbed onto a web that was in the top corner Andy that’s where’s you found the buzzing culprit: a caught fly. The spider launched herself at it and you almost fell off at the sudden movement. Right now, you don’t have a choice but to listen to her eat the fly in gruesome fashion. When she’s finished, you freeze when one of her four middle legs scratches her back, near where you are. She crawls over to another fly and swallows this one whole. She then positions herself and leaps outwards and away from the web and corner. This causes you to fall off and land right in the middle of her web. Now you’re stuck in a literal fashion.
12431.title: Oof

choices: An animal crawled onto the land mass but you are unnoticed
13.content: The air is heavy and humid. Fallen trees are scattered in a few areas covered in moss. Water is all around, your on a large to you, raised land mass. It dawns on you that you stranded in a swamp. There is a distinctive smell to the air. Looking around the only cover you can see is a pile of rocks or a hole in a near by log. Thinking it best to get to cover, and plan out how to get help, you turn to one of the shelters.
13.title: A Swamp

133.content:
Turns out this swamp is the territory of a dragon. However, she looks more like a sea serpent than a dragon. Her scales look slimy, but are hard as diamond. She has frills running along her back. She’s a nice muddy green color and her frills are a slightly lighter shade. Her jet black eyes match the water and her fangs are deep grey. She can “sing,” which has caused several men to go missing. She’s an omnivore and will eat anything (except trash and other). She has ten limbs, but can meld them to her body to add speed. She can float for short whiles (2-4 days at a time). She collects skeletons, which she keeps in her den below the murky water. She’s mostly nocturnal, but can function any time.

You decide to swim out to the log and soon realize it’s farther than you first thought. You think you see something under you, but push it away and keep going. The dragon slowly swims under you, then notices you’re headed to the log. Using her fan tipped tail (looks like Vaporeon’s), she causes a wave that carries you closer, about 100 feet away. However, you’re tired and start to go under. Noticing this, the dragon snaps you up and take you to her den. Where are you?
133.title: An animal notices you

14.content:
You look to see that you are surrounded by bricks and look up to see bars all around. Then you look to see a sign that tells you, you are in the zoo. You're only one inch tall and in the zoo. From the looks of it the zoo is closed. You are the only human here. It's scary at first, but then you figure, this way you can see the animals up close. You look up and see a sign pointing in four directions, North, South, East and West. Each direction appeared to have different animals and you couldn't decide where to go. You heard so many different sounds. An elephant's trumpet, a lion's roar, the shrieking of an eagle. It was too much to resist.

So which way do you go?
14.title: Tiny in the Zoo

141.content:
You decide to walk straight forward North to see which animals were directly ahead of you. However, after fifteen minutes, you only manage to get a foot and a half away from the sign. You had forgotten you had shrunken to one inch tall and it would take much longer to get any farther in this new, much, much, much bigger zoo. As you stop to catch your breath, you see what looks like a tiny toy bicycle. Some kid must've dropped it on their last trip to the zoo, but it was a lucky break for you. Without even a second thought, you jump on the bike and start peddling. Why a tiny toy bike has peddles, don't ask me.

Soon you move through the North wing of the zoo and feel vibrations. You then look ahead to see a sign that read "don't feed the elephants". You then turn your head to see a sign with a hippopotamus on it and then you see a few giraffe's heads sticking up and then next to the giraffes is a sign with a rhinoceros on it. You figure you must've been in the large mammals section of the zoo and that explained the vibration. These animals were already much bigger than regular sized humans and you had been shrunken to only an inch tall. They were titanic to you. It was risky, but you wanted to go into one of the cages and see these giants up close.

The only question is, which giant animal do you want to see?
141.title: North Wing of the Zoo

1411.content:
You wheel your bike up to the elephant cage and then you decide to venture inside and take a closer look. You climb over the bottom lining of the exhibit and then run down until you tumble to the ground. On the ground of the exhibit, you can barely stand because all of the elephants stomping around are causing vibrations. You look up in awe and see there are twenty African elephants in this exhibit. They mostly all adult elephants twelve feet tall and with your shrunken self, these animals, already extremely big, were nearly 150 times bigger than you.

You have to cover your ears as these elephants trumpet loudly. Then you have to slip to the side as one particularly big elephant nearly steps on you. You need to be more careful. Observing these elephants was very dangerous at your small size. But it was also very fun. They were pretty much planets. You need to find a way to watch one of these giants from a safe distance and you have to find that safe distance fast. You nearly avoid being stomped by three more elephants before you run to the side and let out a sigh. This was kinda exciting.

You then decide that you will observe...?
1411.title: Pachyderm Titans

14113.content:
You suddenly feel several tremors and gasp as you turn around and fall flat on your back just as a giant elephant's foot lands in front of you, narrowly avoiding smashing you to bits. You hear a trumpet and look up to see the pinkish gray elephant right in front of you. This enormous elephant was much bigger than the others. It looked to be 20ft high, making the creature utterly enormous to a inch high human like you as it lifts its trunk and trumpets loudly. You take a closer look at the elephant's face and you see that the elephant appears to be a female elephant and from the looks of it, she's older than the rest of the elephants. Given her size and her age, she must've been the matriarch of the elephant enclosure.

The elephant trumpets again and starts to walk, forcing you to run as you're looking back at the enormous encroaching feet that could flatten you to a pancake. The elephant pauses and then you see her hold her foot over a pumpkin before smashing it and then using her trunk to go through and eat it. As the elephant is eating, some bits of pumpkin fall out of her mouth and land on top of you as you groan. You then gasp because the elephant might see you with the pumpkin all over you and try to eat you. Not wanting to take any chances, you shake off the pumpkin mush and then try to inch away. As you're sprinting, the elephant matriarch's ears twitch and she gives a trumpet of confusion before turning. She focuses her eyes and sees something running from her. She also realizes that the creature she spots appears too small to be a mouth and therefore she didn't have to fear it.

Out of curiosity, the elderly 20ft elephant stomps her way towards you and lowers her head. She then stamps her foot as you yell and you're knocked off of your feet. The elephant's trunk inches towards you and sniffs you as the elephant matriarch leans down and gives a snort through her trunk. You shiver at what this elephant will do now. She obviously has never seen a human so tiny before. You try to inch away, but the elephant inhales you into her trunk and then you yell and grab hold of the thick gray elephant flesh inside the elderly African elephant's nose. You slip on the mucus and have to hold on so you don't completely fall inside as the elephant is lifting up her massive trunk.

You climb up the nostril and you see a moon-sized eye in front of you that makes you shiver. The elephant giantess is looking down on you. You really hope this elephant is friendly as she blows air from her trunk that hits you. You look around at her massive ears and long tusks and wonder what will come next. That's when something strange happens. "Well I'll be," says the elephant in a deep yet surprisingly feminine contralto. "I knew all humans were smaller than elephants but I didn't think I'd find a human this small. Then again, I'm usually large even for an elephant." You gasp. That elephant just... spoke to you. First you were shrunk to an inch high and now an elephant is talking. What next? You just hope this elderly elephant titaness is gentle.
14113.title: The Walking Tower

choices: The Hippo Feels You and Turns Her Head to See You
1412.content:
You decide to take a look at the hippo exhibit and peddle your tiny bike and 1-inch tall self into the hippo cage. You bike down the slope leading into the exhibit and see several enormous hippos. You're 1-inch tall, making these creatures bigger than whales to you. You peddle by just under the legs of a particularly large behemoth that lazily waddles by now even noticing you. These obese titans are a most wondrous sight and you can't help but stare at all the huge beasts that stumble by.

You watch as a hippopotamus lumbers in the water and snorts bubbles and then you turn and see a hippopotamus chewing away at a cabbage and even a mother hippo nursing her baby. However, as you're peddling you are too busy gawking at such enormous hippos that you aren't paying attention to where you're going and your bike bumps into a pebble and bends the wheel. You scream and try to steady the bike but you continue to swerve out of control towards the water.

Your bike tumbles into the water just as a hippo swims by. The beast's movements push you through the water and you yell right before the hippo releases an explosive fart that propels you through the lake filled with corpulent swimming giants. You're pushed under the water and see several tubby feet go by and you're kicked to the side by an oblivious hippo. You then grab your throat and you force yourself to swim upwards to prevent yourself from drowning.

At last you swim upwards and then you see an enormous hippopotamus butt right in front of you. The butt has got to be 150 times bigger than you and you gasp. You tap the side of the hippo butt and it appears the hippopotamus doesn't even feel you. You then realize that this hippopotamus is a female hippopotamus as you look closer. This gray skinned giantess was way too busy eating a cabbage to notice you. You figure that the water wasn't safe, so you grab the hippo by her tail and begin to climb upwards, hoping that you will be able to get out of the water and find safety on the hippo's back. After 30 seconds of climbing the big hippo's butt...
1412.title: In the Hippo Cage

choices: Your blown into a yawning hippo’s mouth
You end up in another cage
14123.content: You climb up the hippos but by gripping her tail. You grip it a few times as she moves it a bit. Your level with her butt hole, went she released hurricane like fart. You grip as hard as you can on her tail, but start to feel your hands slipping. You try and hold on as best you can.
14123.title: The Hippo Farts

141232.content:
You try and hold on as the hurricane like fart blows you off her tail. You go tumble though the air and hope you don’t get hurt during the landing. Your momentum slows down and you start to fall downwards. You get control of your body enough to look at where your going. Looking down you see you're about to land on the head of another hippo that laying in the water. As you get close enough and are about to land, the hippo lifts its head upwards and yawns. “No!!!” You yell as you fly into the mouth and land in its tongue with a splat.

The hippo closes it mouth sealing you in as it Wades to the shallows. You sit up in the dark, but can feel the strands of saliva dripping off of you. The tongue your on lifts up and pushes you against the roof of the mouth. It squeezes you between the two as your dragged along the ridges.The tongue lowers and you slip under it as it lands on top if you like a heavy blanket. You struggle in the collecting saliva under the tongue.

The hippo walks to feeding area, since it yawned earlier it has a uniquely delicious taste invade its mouth making it hungry, and decides it’s time for lunch. It brings its head down to grab a head of lettuce.

You had managed to get to the side and pull yourself back on top of the tongue. Your wondering how you could get out when the hippo’s moth opens and light floods in. You get a better look at the surroundings. The younger beneath you is wrinkled and slimy. Huge yellow spire like teeth rise up at the front of the mouth. The ridges you dragged across on the roof of the mouth are thick and big. The throat and mouth are made in a way that the hippo probably doesn’t need to chew much just crush and swallow. You brought out of your musings about you surroundings when the hippo’head tilt downwards.
You get caught up in a saliva flow and are headed out of the mouth. You see the hippo about to grab a head of lettuce. You can’t stand up or get out of the flow and just hope you make it out in time.
141232.title: Your blown into a yawning hippo’s mouth

1412321.content:
“Yes yes yes!” You shout excitedly as you pass between the hippos teeth. You are almost free of it’s mouth. You fall from it lip and drop down on to a soft surface. You sigh in relief that you avoided being eaten, but that is short lived, as you notice you had fallen onto the head of lettuce. The hippo’s mouth casts a dark shadow over you as it bites down on the lettuce.

“Nooo!” You scream as it lifts the lettuce up and you are tossed back onto its tongue as the hippo bites down on the lettuce. You are tossed around as it chews up its food, and unknowingly, nearly chews you. After what seems like forever, you get caught in another river of saliva, but this on is headed for its throat. “No! Don’t eat me!” You scream as you try to fight the current while being weighed down by chunks of lettuce surrounding you. “Gulp!” The hippo swallows its mouth full of lettuce and the one small human trap among it.

The throat squeezed you rhythmically as it pulled you down towards the stomach. No matter how hard you tried you couldn’t get a grip to stop your decent. You hear a rush of water, before a water fall hits you from above and quickens your decent. You fall into a liquid lake filled with what you assume is the lettuce and what ever else the hippo has eaten today. It’s completely pitch dark and that unnerved you more. You grab onto one of the floating objects around you to stay afloat. It didn’t take long for the stomach to start churning as you assume it’s started the digestion process.
1412321.title: To late, it’s mouth closes

1413.content: What other animal exhibit will you find to explore in the heavy animal wing?
1413.title: Look for the Other Exhibits

141331.content: You enter the lion enclosure to look around you are looking around when something pins you to the ground. When you are rolled over you see a lioness looking at you from between her toes. She locks her lips and asks if you are ready to be devoured. When you say how can you talk she says that something in her food made her able to talk. She then asks if you are ready to be devoured. When you look at her belly you say no but she ignores you and licks you into her mouth anyway and savours you before gulping you down whole and alive. You struggle helplessly down her throat and in her belly. You here her burp and slowly and surley digest into a mush inside your giant Goddesses belly.
141331.title: Eaten by a lioness.

141332.content: Other exhibits this way are:
141332.title: Other

142.content:
You decide to ride the bike South of the zoo to see what awaits. You hear a growling noise and then you look up to see several signs. There was one sign that pointed to the reptile house that had exhibits of chameleons, frogs and even an anaconda and python. There was also a sign that highlighted an exhibit of giant galapagos tortoise and another sign that pointed to the saltwater crocodile pit. It looks like you came to a reptile part of the zoo.

The only question is, where do you go from here?
142.title: South of the zoo

choices: Go to the insect exhibit next door.
1423.content: You’ve always been fascinated by the reptiles house. At this size you should be able to see more detail. Walking down the path leading to the reptiles house you see it’s entrance is closed, but your just small enough to squeeze though a crack under the door. Walking in you can feel the humidity is perfect for reptiles. Looking around you see the walls of tanks holding the reptiles lined up. Each tank is designed the mimic the reptiles natural habitat. Deciding you want to look at the animals you go towards the tanks.
1423.title: The reptile house

143.content:
You decide to go East and you find a toy bike to travel faster. You keep on wheeling as you hear roaring. You turn to see a sign with a lion's face on it. You then see a cage with a tiger in it. It would appear that you're in the exhibit with the big cats; lions, tigers, pumas, cheetahs, the whole shebang. You even gulp because you're in a dangerous area. But you're feeling daring and think you're invincible.

So which exhibit will you look into?
143.title: East of the zoo

1433.content: There’s that new bird exhibit they added. Want to check it out?
1433.title: More Choices

14331.content: You remember the announcement of the addition of a flight bird exhibit (as opposed to flight less, like penguins). You head there, having many close calls. When you reach it, you are confused. The enclosure is a mixed of caves, open air, and scarce “dead” trees. Regardless, you climb in. Walking around, you see no birds. You climb a tree and onto a branch that leads into a cave. You enter the cave and find
14331.title: Sure.

143311.content: You notice something on the walls. On closer inspection, they’re white lines. 4 Claws-lines cover two of the walls. Then you notice an animal skeleton nearby. It smells, but even you can’t find a piece of meat. You pale as you realize that the birds are efficient hunters. That’s when you hear flapping.
143311.title: Multiple Talon Scratches (Sharp Claws)

1433111.content: You slowly turn, and freeze. The bird has returned with another small human in its beak. It sets down said human, then looks at you. From the darkness of the cave, you can surprisingly make out a lot on the bird. Black wings and a dark grey head. Red horizontal slit eyes watch his every move. You look down at its feet and pale. It’s talons are curved and black. Four claws in front, two in back for grip and control. Before you can do anything, the human beside the massive bird whispers something to it, and it’s flies off.
1433111.title: Turn around.

choices: You hear the flapping of wings.
143312.content: There's a white blotch in front of you. As your eyes get used to the darkness, you realize it's the perfectly arranged skeleton of a fully grown male buck.
143312.title: An Animal Skeleton

151.content:
You look at your surroundings. Dry leaves, an occasional bunch of giant grass, but mainly just brown dirt. You look up. Your vision is filled by gargantuan trees. You are in a forest. You think of the benefits. At least you could hide easier. Then you remember that forests are full of creatures, big and small. You gulp at the thought.

Standing, up you wonder which direction you should go, but before you take a step the ground shakes. Something approaches. You hear rustling in the bushes. You stand still, paralyzed by fear. The creature steps out. It is a...
151.title: A Forest

1512.content: You sigh in relief as the creature turns out to be a doe. You had expected something far worse. Then you realize that you should still be careful. The doe is, after all, huge and you just happen to be in her path. Paying little heed to her footsteps, the doe rampages towards you. You try to get out of the way, but each step the doe takes counts for ten of yours. Hopeless, you brace yourself for impact when...
1512.title: Gargantuan Doe

15121.content:
You shiver on the ground, eyes closed as you wait for the gargantuan hoof to land on you. You wait. Nothing happens. You open your eyes. A shadow looms over you. You look up. Your gaze is met by the giant muzzle of the doe. She has noticed you. You stand still, unsure of what to do. The doe begins to sniff. She is clearly trying to determine what you were. You hope she does not think you are vegetation.

Deer, however, are not as stupid as some humans think. The doe could clearly make you out as a human. Though she was used to humans being bigger she still could identify you. Too long had she lived in fear of getting a belly full of lead. Too many friends of her's had been shot down mercilessly by those filthy humans. Too great was the grudge inside her to ignore this human who somehow was below average size; below fear.

Your eyes meet the the doe's gaze. Somehow you sense a fire in them that tells you to run and indeed, you do. You run. You hear hooves thundering behind you. You try to make it to the undergrowth for cover. It looks as if you will make it. You are almost there. But the doe had only been toying with you. If she would have wanted to crush you instantly she could have. Her hate for humans, however, made her want to do something even more painful, to give the human a death it deserved. With lighting speed she jumps in front of you and lowers her head. Before you have time to react you run straight into the doe's open mouth. The jaws slam shut behind you and you land face-down on the wet tongue. The air is humid and deer smelling. You attempt to bash through the closed jaws, but all you achieve is a knock on the head. The doe laughs (the way deer do) at your futile attempt and quickly pins you with her tongue. She lets her tongue wash you with her saliva. She sucks on you and tosses you around. She rubs you against her slimy cheek and moans with sadistic pleasure.

Soon, the doe decides it is time for revenge and so tilts her head back. You scream for mercy as you slide into her gullet, but all you receive as an answer is an audible, "GLURK". Efficiently, you slide down the doe's esophagus still squirming. You just cannot accept the fact that your life will end inside the stomach of a deer. Inevitably, you come to the end of your slide as the welcoming stomach opens to you. A horrid smell fills your nostrils and quickly you end up splashing around in nothing else, but gastric juice. The liquid fills your mouth giving you your last taste; a disgustingly bitter taste. Slowly, you begin to feel as the corrosive acid eats away your skin layer by layer. You writhe in pain, but nothing gives you ease. The stomach begins to fill with mush which clearly is the doe's lunch. You spend the last, painful moments of your life as nothing more than a topping on a salad.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------< br />
The doe was satisfied. She had avenged all the poor deer who had fallen to human fire. Now, she also realized how good a human tasted to say nothing of the feeling of it sliding down her throat. Perhaps this was a sign from mother nature of a new era. An era where humans are inferior. The thought made the doe feel encouraged. For a moment she enjoyed the feeling of the human tickling her tummy. Then she began grazing, continuing her life as if nothing special had occurred.
15121.title: Revenge Is Tasty

15123.content: The ground stops shaking. You open one eye. The doe has stopped. She is grazing only inches away from you. You slowly begin to back off. You do not want her to see you. She is a herbivore yes, but she still is huge and that is enough to make you twitch. As she chews her eyes drift on you. Your heart misses a beat. You dare not move as her oppressing gaze studies you. She swallows the bunch of grass in her mouth and approaches you. You break for it and dash blindly into the opposite direction. You hear the doe snort behind you, but you do not turn. You keep on running.
15123.title: Losing it.

151232.content: Just when you are about to throw yourself into the undergrowth another deer steps out in front of you. You come to a quick halt and dash of in another direction, but once again a deer appears in front of you. You spin around, but to your horror you find that the whole clearing is full of deer. An angry looking buck approaches your position. You are not sure whether it has seen you, but you do not think you want to find out. You look to your sides. You could sprint through the grazing does, but that is not very inviting either. The buck is very close and you are forced to make up your mind.
151232.title: Thre cruelty of chance.

1512321.content:
Taking on an angry buck is not exactly on your priorities list so without second thought you sidestep the thundering hooves and dash through the grazing does. Only inches to your left a huge muzzle clamps over a bunch of vegetation and rips it from its roots. The deer begins to chew and the mashing of those teeth is more than enough to hasten your sprint. The thought of ending up in one of those jaws is not welcoming...

Distracted by your thoughts you forget to look where you are going. Before you have a chance to realize your mistake a giant saliva covered tongue comes at you and laps you up into a humid cavern that is nothing else, but the mouth of a deer. Your vision is engulfed by darkness as the teeth come together behind you, but not before you get a glimpse of the most revolting sight. Threads of saliva hang off the monstrous maw and bits of chewed up vegetation dot the browned molars that could crush you with little effort. There, however, is little time to think as the tongue that just a second before licked you up begins tossing you around. The sticky saliva soaks your body as the wet and warm muscle massages your puny body. There is little you can do to fight back and that little only causes the tongue to become ever more aggressive. The doe lets out small vocalizations as it analyzes your taste. Whatever it thinks you are, it seems to enjoy you. As a finale you are pressed hard against the mouths palate and sucked on greedily before a simple flick sends you darting into the gullet. Without a moments hesitation the magnificent creature swallows, forcing you with a loud 'gulp' down its slimy esophagus and towards your painfully slow and foul smelling end of digestion.
1512321.title: Price of Cowardice

1512322.content: Running away would only intimidate the buck, this you know too well. The thundering hooves quickly cover the distance between them and you. Standing up straight you prepare to face the buck who seemingly has taken interest in your puny, but nonetheless eccentric being. It lowers its head down to your level and fills your view with its massive nostrils through which air is being drawn and exhaled with enough force to almost pull you off your feet. You try to appear determined and strong, but the vicious eyes of the buck cause your heart to beat faster and cold sweat runs down your spine as a reminder of the rigidity of the situation you are in. If the buck sees you as nothing more than an insignificant creature then, with luck, you might survive all this. BUT if it determines you to be a rival... you rather not think of that.You simply wait for the buck to make its move.
1512322.title: Face to Face

1513.content: The sound was made by:
1513.title: Other

choices: is she preparing to eat you
152.content: You realize that you are in the hot Savannah and look around. You see what you think is a rock and Run over to it to keep cool. Only when you hear a rumble to you realize that you are laying against a giant lionesses belly. She feels something against her stomach and takes a look and is delightfully surprised to find a tiny human. She pins them under her paw and begins to flex her toes. After a while her belly rumbles and she opens her mouth.
152.title: The Savanna

choices: Flee, it's too dangerous to stay
Stay, it's too dangerous to go alone
You take too long to decide and another lion appears
1521.content:
The lioness looks down at you for a few moments more before opening her mouth wide. You stare up into the dark hole of her throat, and the sight terrifies you, causing you to squirm and wriggle under the heavy paw of the lioness with even more energy. But you're still trapped, and you can't do anything to escape.

However, it seems like that might not be necessary. The lioness closes her mouth, and you look up in surprise as she locks eyes with you again. Apparently, she was simply yawning. You feel relieved, but that feeling vanished as the feline lowers her head towards you and sticks her tongue out, giving you a quick and slimy lick that covers your face and coats your head in drool. You squirm some more, the fears of being eaten having been reawoken, but once again, the lioness makes no move to eat you. You stop struggling and look up again, and watch as the lioness snorts and, shockingly, lifts her paw off of you.

You lie on the ground still, unsure of what to do. The lioness just released you. Does that mean she doesn't want to eat you? Seemingly, she disliked your taste, so that seems likely.

You stand up, and the lioness watches you, but makes no move to pin you or eat you. You look up at her, and uncertainty fills your mind. You're afraid of staying here in case the giant feline changes her mind, but you're also unsure if it would be best to leave. After all, if this lioness does not want to eat you, then that means you should be safe with her.

So you have a choice. Flee or stay. What do you choose?
1521.title: Spared

1522.content: You stare in horror as your vision fills with her open mouth. Her fangs glisten in the sun and saliva reflects off of her tongue. You stare into the back of her throat. You are frozen with fear as the lioness close her mouth, licking her lips as well. However, she looks it you with her deep, unnaturally red eyes with a look of care. You relax and lean against her belly. That’s a mistake. Before you register what’s happening, your world becomes darkness, heat and wetness. The lioness grinned to herself as she lifted her head, now with a treat in her mouth. She allowed them to run around for a while, then tilted her head. Your world went weightless for a split second, then you fell. The trip was slow, and the bulge was barely noticeable. You disappeared into her belly without a trace. You decide to get used to your new home. That’s when your world shakes.
1522.title: is she preparing to eat you

1553.content: How about somewhere snowy, like the Arctic, Antarctica, or just some high mountain or the like?
1553.title: Somewhere snowy?

info.brief_description: You're shrunk and surrounded by giant animals. It's a dream come true and a nightmare.
info.description:
You wake up to find that you are only an inch tall. You've always wanted to find out what it would be like to be shrunken, but now you're surronded by now giant animals that are quite hungry and you're on the menu! PLEASE ADD!

Rules:
1. This is a vore story so it must end with you getting eaten, but soft vore Oral only.
2. No nudity or sex
3. No anthros, furries, or video game animals
4. Be as descriptive as possible. So try to make any additions longer than two sentences.
5. No humans, shrunken or normal sized, other than your self.
6. You are the main character so don't give the main character a name or mention their gender.
7. Have Fun!

Other than that I won't delete much.
